mapper.insert: insert into department(`name`, `parent_id`, `manager_id`, `operator_id`, `enterprise_id`, `create_time`, `update_time`) values(#{name}, #{parentId}, #{managerId}, #{operatorId}, #{enterpriseId}, now(), now())
mapper.select:
select d.id, d.enterprise_id as enterpriseId, d.name, d.parent_id as parentId, p.name as parentName, d.manager_id as managerId, u1.mobile as managerMobile, up1.sgname as managerName, up1.email as managerEmail, up1.description as managerDescription, count(DISTINCT du.user_id) as userCount from department d left join department p on d.parent_id = p.id left join user_profile up1 on d.manager_id=up1.user_id left join user u1 on d.manager_id=u1.id left join department_user du on du.department_id=d.id where d.delete_flg=0
and d.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and d.enterprise_id=#{enterpriseId}
group by d.id order by d.id desc

select id, name from department d where delete_flg=0
and d.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and d.enterprise_id=#{enterpriseId}
order by id desc

select d.id, d.enterprise_id, d.name, d.parent_id, d.manager_id, u1.mobile as managerMobile, up1.sgname as managerName, up1.email as managerEmail, up1.description as managerDescription, p.name as parentName, du.id as departmentUserId, du.department_id, up2.user_id as userId,u2.mobile as userMobile, up2.sgname as userSgname, up2.email as userEmail, up2.description as userDescription from department d left join department p on d.parent_id = p.id left join user_profile up1 on d.manager_id=up1.user_id left join user u1 on d.manager_id=u1.id left join department_user du on du.department_id=d.id left join user_profile up2 on du.user_id=up2.user_id left join user u2 on du.user_id=u2.id where d.delete_flg=0
and d.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and d.enterprise_id=#{enterpriseId}
order by d.id desc

select d.id, d.enterprise_id, d.name, d.parent_id, d.manager_id, u1.mobile as managerMobile, up1.sgname as managerName, up1.email as managerEmail, up1.description as managerDescription, p.name as parentName,du.id as departmentUserId, du.department_id, up2.user_id as userId,u2.mobile as userMobile, up2.sgname as userSgname, up2.email as userEmail, up2.description as userDescription from department d left join department p on d.parent_id = p.id left join user_profile up1 on d.manager_id=up1.user_id left join user u1 on d.manager_id=u1.id left join department_user du on du.department_id=d.id left join user_profile up2 on du.user_id=up2.user_id left join user u2 on du.user_id=u2.id where d.id=#{id}
